mapper.select: SELECT /* MenuIntegrationMapper.xml, selectMenuIntegrationList, SAC 전시 , 2014-05-19 */ TENANT_ID, SYSTEM_ID, MENU_KEY, UP_MENU_KEY, EXPO_ORD, IMG_PATH, MENU_NM, INJT_VAR, KEY_TYPE FROM TB_DP_MENU_LIST_CATEGORY WHERE 1=1 AND TENANT_ID = #{tenantId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND SYSTEM_ID = #{systemId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND UP_MENU_KEY = #{upMenuKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND EXPO_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY EXPO_ORD
